nodes.text: Ku Chusar was a male artist who made several abstract paintings. He was recognized as one of the most famous artists of his time. By 44 ABY, Galactic Alliance Chief of State Natasi Daala owned several of Chusar's paintings, which she kept framed in her private apartments on Coruscant.
Ku Chusar received his first and only mention in Star Wars canon to date in Christie Golden's 2010 novel, Fate of the Jedi: Allies, the fifth novel in the Fate of the Jedi series.
